name: Network Capital Token
description: Basically Network Capital intends to surpass the leading projects in the industry in quality of service, rates, commissions, rewards, security and project. We want to give the cryptographic world a token of quality, scalability and utility, as well as a project that covers all sectors to take advantage of and improve them. Our goal is to be the most secure, sustainable and profitable decentralized bank in the crypto space. Granting benefits of 125% monthly interest.
